alert.note: Alert for Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 11 at 3:42AM EST until March 13 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 9 to 14 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Somerset, Northwest Aroostook and Northern Piscataquis Counties. * WHEN...From late tonight through late Saturday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel could be extremely dangerous. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility and cause localized hazardous travel. Power outages are possible.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow, sleet or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook
